education_text.0: Gregory Chaitin is      redirect    Jewish and he attended the      Bronx High School of Science Bronx High School of Science and      City College of New York City College of New York, where he (still in his teens) developed the theory that led to his independent discovery of      Kolmogorov complexity algorithmic complexityHe was formerly a researcher at IBM's Thomas JIn 1995 he was given the degree of doctor of science      redirect    Honoris causa honoris causa by the      University of Maine University of Maine
